mapper.select: select id, `name`, `desc`, exp, create_time, update_time, create_by, involve, is_delete, field_type, data_type,expression from datalabel where id = #{id} and is_delete=0
select id, `name`, `desc`, exp, create_time, update_time, create_by, involve, is_delete, field_type, data_type from datalabel where is_delete=0
mapper.insert: insert into datalabel(`name`, `desc`, exp, create_time, update_time, create_by, field_type, data_type,expression) values (#{name}, #{desc}, #{exp}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createBy}, #{fieldType}, #{dataType}, #{expression})

insert into datalabel(`name`, `desc`, exp, create_time, update_time, create_by, involve, is_delete) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.desc}, #{entity.exp}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.involve}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into datalabel(`name`, `desc`, exp, create_time, update_time, create_by, involve, is_delete) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.desc}, #{entity.exp}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.involve}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update `name` = values(`name`), `desc` = values(`desc`), exp = values(exp), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), create_by = values(create_by), involve = values(involve), is_delete = values(is_delete)
mapper.update:
update datalabel
`name` = #{name},
`desc` = #{desc},
`expression` = #{expression},
exp = #{exp},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
involve = #{involve},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
data_type = #{dataType},
field_type = #{fieldType},
where id = #{id} and create_by = #{createBy}
update datalabel set is_delete=1 where id = #{id} and create_by = #{createBy}
update datalabel set is_delete=1 where id in (#{id}) and create_by = #{createBy}
